p: The air-dried powdered aerial parts of EC (100 g) were extracted with methanol (2 × 500 mL) using an IKA Ultra-Turrax T 25 digital instrument (IKA Labortechnik, Staufen, Germany). The solvent was removed under reduced pressure and the dried total methanolic extract (TEC) (10.9 g) was kept at 4 °C until use in biological tests.
